short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists links to browser's currently opened tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Headlight is an extension for keeping track of open tabs and having direct access to their URLs.

💡It lists the titles of all currently opened browser tabs.
💡Upon clicking each title, the link to the web page will be copied to your clipboard.
💡It allows export/takeout of lists of opened tabs' links.

🪲 If you face any problems or have feature requests, send an email to  codedbymais@gmail.com

🤝 If you would like to support this project, please consider leaving a review.
